title: Attendance at Cineplex cinemas 2010 to 2018
summary: In general Attendance in millions has rose over the Year.
Attendance in millions is roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Attendance in millions, of value 77.0 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest Attendance in millions, of value 71.2 was reported at Year 2012
